main_tagline: We forge immersive worlds and unforgettable gameplay
about_text: We are a passionate team creating immersive worlds and unforgettable gameplay.
about_strength_story_text: We craft rich narratives that stay with players long after the game ends.
about_strength_art_text: Our visuals speak for our worlds — unique, dark, and beautiful.
about_strength_tech_text: We build stable and scalable systems ready for growth.
project_text: Echoes of Darkness is a tactical card game blending the strategic depth of Gwent with the narrative soul of DnD.
project_lore: In the forgotten corners of the realm, where the veil between worlds thins, ancient forces stir once more. Whispers echo through ruined spires, and cursed kings rise from their graves. You are not just a player— you are a commander of fate in a world where every card holds a secret, and every choice echoes in darkness.
team_artur_desc: Leads the vision, keeps the team aligned, and makes sure deadlines don’t slip into the void
team_nastia_desc: Creates sleek UI and interactive magic in React
team_yulia_desc: Shapes the visual soul of our worlds
team_andrii_desc: Architects stable systems and deep logic
team_yarik_desc: Crushes bugs and ensures polished gameplay
contact_text: Have a vision, idea or question? Send us a whisper in the dark...
